numSigsPayer.label: # payer sigs
numSigsPayer.tip: Number of signatures authorizing the transfer of the payment

numSigsScheduled.label: # scheduled txn sigs
numSigsScheduled.tip: Number of signatures provided for the pending transaction being scheduled

numSigsTotal.label: # total sigs
numSigsTotal.tip: Total number of signatures on transaction â€“ includes payer signatures and others

numAdminKeys.label: # admin keys
numAdminKeys.tip: Number of Ed25519 keys used in an admin key

numKeys.label: # keys
numKeys.tip: Number of public keys attached to created/updated object

numAdminKeysIncrease.label: # admin keys added (relative to existing # admin keys)
numAdminKeysIncrease.tip: Number of public keys added to the admin Hedera key

numKycKeysIncrease.label: # KYC keys added (relative to existing # KYC keys)
numKycKeysIncrease.tip: Number of public keys added to the KYC Hedera key

numWipeKeysIncrease.label: # wipe keys added (relative to existing # wipe keys)
numWipeKeysIncrease.tip: Number of public keys added to the wipe Hedera key

numSupplyKeysIncrease.label: # supply keys added (relative to existing # supply keys)
numSupplyKeysIncrease.tip: Number of public keys added to the supply Hedera key

numFreezeKeysIncrease.label: # freeze keys added (relative to existing # freeze keys)
numFreezeKeysIncrease.tip: Number of public keys added to the freeze Hedera key

numAdminKeys.label: # admin keys
numAdminKeys.tip: Number of public keys in the admin Hedera key

numKycKeys.label: # KYC keys
numKycKeys.tip: Number of public keys in the KYC Hedera key

numWipeKeys.label: # wipe keys
numWipeKeys.tip: Number of public keys in the wipe Hedera key

numSupplyKeys.label: # supply keys
numSupplyKeys.tip: Number of public keys in the supply Hedera key

numFreezeKeys.label: # freeze keys
numFreezeKeys.tip: Number of public keys in the freeze Hedera key

expirationHours.label: Expiration
expirationHours.caption: hours
expirationHours.tip: Storage duration for objects created in state. This parameter is currently fixed to 2160 hours (3 months) while the network is in beta

numTokensInvolved.label: # tokens involved in the transaction
numTokensInvolved.tip: A single transaction can involve multiple tokens

numTokenBalanceAdjustments.label: # token balances adjusted
numTokenBalanceAdjustments.tip: A single transaction can adjust the balances of multiple tokens, for multiple accounts

numAccountsOnTransfer.label: # accounts on transfer
numAccountsOnTransfer.tip: A single transfer can have multiple paying and/or recipient accounts

numLivehashes.label: # livehashes on account
numLivehashes.tip: Hashes of identity claims can be attached to an account

numProxyAccounts.label: # proxy-staking accounts
numProxyAccounts.tip: How many accounts proxy stake to this node account

numTokensAssociated.label: # tokens associated
numTokensAssociated.tip: How many tokens are being associated to the account

numTokensDissociated.label: # tokens dissociated
numTokensDissociated.tip: How many tokens are being dissociated from the account

numThresholdsDefined.label: # thresholds defined
numThresholdsDefined.tip: How many thresholds for record generation does the account have

scheduledTransactionBytesSize.label: scheduled transaction byte size
scheduledTransactionBytesSize.caption: bytes
scheduledTransactionBytesSize.tip: The number of bytes in the serialized form of a scheduled transaction

memoSize.label: memo size
memoSize.caption: bytes
memoSize.tip: How large is any memo specified for a transaction or entity

tokenNameSizeIncrease.label: increase in token name size
tokenNameSizeIncrease.caption: bytes
tokenNameSizeIncrease.tip: How much larger is the designated token name

tokenSymbolSizeIncrease.label: increase in token symbol size
tokenSymbolSizeIncrease.caption: bytes
tokenSymbolSizeIncrease.tip: How much larger is the designated token symbol

tokenNameSize.label: token name size
tokenNameSize.caption: bytes
tokenNameSize.tip: How large is the designated token name

tokenSymbolSize.label: token symbol size
tokenSymbolSize.caption: bytes
tokenSymbolSize.tip: How large is the designated token symbol

is25HourRecordCreated.label: 24 hour record created?
is25HourRecordCreated.tip: If a transfer exceeds a sending or receiving threshold, a record will be generated and stored for 24 hours

numEntitiesReturned.label: # entities returned
numEntitiesReturned.tip: How many entities are returned in the response

numRecordsReturned.label: # records returned
numRecordsReturned.tip: How many records are returned in the response

isStateProofRequested.label: State proof requested?
isStateProofRequested.caption: coming soon
isStateProofRequested.tip: For any query, is a state proof requested for the response

contractConstructorCallParamsSize.label: Contract constructor/call params
contractConstructorCallParamsSize.caption: bytes
contractConstructorCallParamsSize.tip: Size of a smart contract constructor/call

contractFunctionReturnSize.label: Contract function return size
contractFunctionReturnSize.caption: bytes
contractFunctionReturnSize.tip: Size of the results of a smart contract operation

gas.label: Gas
gas.tip: How much gas is consumed by the smart contract operation

isScheduledPayerDifferent.label: non-scheduling payer?
isScheduledPayerDifferent.tip: Is the payer for the scheduled transaction different than the scheduling payer?

isAutoRenewAccountNewlyAdded.label: auto renew account is added?
isAutoRenewAccountNewlyAdded.tip: A token without an autoRenewAccount is being given one?
